title: Visualize transcripts — visualize_transcripts
text: gene gene name transcripts dataframe following required columns x_location, y_location feature_name n_bins number bins use KDE2D (default = 100) output_dir output directory saving (default = ".") save_plot whether save plot (default = TRUE) transcript_size Size transcript (dot) plot (default = 0.1)
